name: AWS Certified AI Practitioner
description: Proactively pursued and achieved the AWS Certified AI Practitioner certification with early adopter badge. Demonstrates expertise in AI/ML services on AWS including foundational AI concepts, generative AI, and responsible AI practices.

name: Full Stack Web Development
description: Comprehensive training in Full Stack Web Development covering Angular, React, JavaScript, TypeScript, Bootstrap, and Git. Also includes foundational skills in HTML5, CSS3, database management (MongoDB and SQL), and data engineering.

name: DevOps and Cloud Technologies
description: Intensive training in DevOps and Cloud Technologies including Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, and continuous integration/deployment pipelines. Focused on automation, scalability, and cloud-based application deployment.

name: Master of Science in Computer Science
description: Master's degree in Computer Science with specialization in Deep Learning. Coursework included Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Cloud Computing, Distributed Systems, Data Structures, Design and Analysis of Algorithms, and Advanced AI topics.

name: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Engineering
description: Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering with strong foundation in Software Development and Design, Android Development, Operating Systems, Computer Networks, Database Management Systems, and fundamental computer science concepts.
